subject: Re: [PATCH 01/13] fs/proc: Don't lock root inode when creating "self" and "thread-self"

reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown suggested removing unnecessary locking in proc_setup_self() and proc_setup_thread_self(), as the filesystem is not yet 'live' at that point, and it's simpler to remove the locking for centralization of directory locking.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the patch [PATCH 10/13] ovl: change ovl_create_real() to get a new lock when re-opening created file, questioning whether it's necessary due to parallel creations and suggesting an alternative approach.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed all patches in the series and provided Reviewed-by tags for each one, indicating that he has reviewed them and they are acceptable as is.
